name: Night Hotel
description:
The small story which tells new details every commit.

Please, note! 

Currently, the game is still under development and not finished. For now, it doesn't have the core gameplay elements.
Instead of this, feel free to check our GDD that contains :

- Main game loops for Horror and RPG games 

- Game deconstruction and decomposition

- Art references and examples.
